    • Constructor Detail

      • PostingsList

        public PostingsList()

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(int docID)
        Adds a document to the PostingsList. Adds 1 to the term frequency for the document in case the document already was in the PostingsList.
        Specified by:
        add in interface IPostingsList

      • add

        public void add(int docID,
       int termFreq)
        Adds the specified docID to the PostingsList and adds the specified amount to the termFrequency. For new entries, this generates a posting with an initial termFrequency of termFreq. This method is used when merging the PostingsLists of several dictionaries.
        Parameters:
        docID - The ID of the document to add.
        termFreq - The term frequency to be added to the current value.

      • doubleSize

        public void doubleSize()
        Not used in this implementation of PostingsList, since memory allocation is handled internally by LinkedHashMap. Returns without performing any changes on the PostingsList.
        Specified by:
        doubleSize in interface IPostingsList

      • isFull

        public boolean isFull()
        Not used in this implementation of PostingsList, since memory allocation is handled internally by LinkedHashMap. Returns a default value of false which does not reflect the actual state of PostingsList in any way.
        Specified by:
        isFull in interface IPostingsList
        Returns:
        true if the postings list is full, otherwise false.

      • getAllocatedSizeInBytes

        public int getAllocatedSizeInBytes()
        PostingsLists have an initial capacity of 1 and increase their capacity by a factor of 2 every time the internal table is filled to capacity. To calculate the actual amount of allocated memory (disregarding class overhead and such) we
        Specified by:
        getAllocatedSizeInBytes in interface IPostingsList
        Returns:
        The number of preallocated Bytes for this postings list.
